comments:
In a MultiPageEditorPart with a TextEditor as one of the pages, the site 
created for the TextEditor is a MultiPageEditorSite. The following 
ClassCastException is received when GotoLineAction is called in the TextEditor:

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.ui.part.MultiPageEditorSite
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.WorkbenchPage.getReference(WorkbenchPage.java

:145)
